subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jon Niese is going on the 15-day disabled list with a shoulder strain but has not felt any pain, Manager Terry Collins said. Zack Wheeler gave the rotation some hope for stability by shutting down Texas.
snippet: Jon Niese is going on the 15-day disabled list with a shoulder strain but has not felt any pain, Manager Terry Collins said. Zack Wheeler gave the rotation some hope for stability by shutting down Texas.
